attributes.action: enforce safety on the streets and crackdown on antisocial behaviour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are too many juveniles on the street drinking and causing havoc. The majority of people i know DO NOT feel safe anymore and these idiots are ruining this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
